I’m confident that rural America will see more progress w/ @AjitPaiFCC’s continued leadership & I’m proud to support his nomination.
Under @AjitPaiFCC’s leadership, the @FCC has made significant investments to deliver #broadband service to underserved parts of the U.S.
I’ve had the pleasure of hosting @AjitPaiFCC & his staff multiple times in #WV & he has witnessed these difficulties firsthand.
Our small towns & bizs lack broadband & lack access to vital opportunities as a result-No one understands these issues more than @AjitPaiFCC
Connecting #WV is one of my top priorities.
From starting a business to digital learning & telemedicine, #broadband access is critical to our economy & communities.
.@AjitPaiFCC has been an important partner in my quest to bring rural America & WV online.
Ahead of @AjitPaiFCC’s confirmation vote, I’ll be speaking on the @SenateFloor in support of him. WATCH LIVE: https://t.co/B78ZDHukws

Let’s create an environment that leads to more investment in #WV & continued job growth. Let’s make it happen with #TaxReform
Comprehensive #TaxReform can provide relief for families & higher wages for workers & increased economic prosperity.
WVians deserve relief from the complexity of the current system & they deserve to keep more of their hard-earned income.
By modernizing the tax code, we can achieve a simpler system w/ lower rates that is good for bizs & workers.
#TaxReform is the change WV needs to revitalize communities & increase economic growth that creates opportunity for future generations.
#TaxReform will enhance growth & provide more job opportunities for Americans.

For the good of the nation & for the good of the Senate, there should be no filibuster of Judge Gorsuch.
I hope my Dem colleagues will recognize the need to invoke cloture on Judge Gorsuch’s nomination.
Judge Gorsuch is a mainstream judge who has earned the respect of his judicial colleagues.
The Senate has a very clear history of rejecting the use of the filibuster against #SCOTUS nominations.
A filibuster of a nominee like Judge Gorsuch would be a tremendous mistake & would harm the Senate as an institution.
.@TheJournalWV echoed these words saying Judge Gorsuch will decide cases regardless of his own preferences
.@IntelligencerWV editorial highlights that Judge Gorsuch is faithful to the #Constitution, not ideology.
Recent @DM_opinion editorial supports Judge Gorsuch’s confirmation & believes he has the strong understanding & respect for our Constitution
It’s clear from our mtg, a thorough examination of his record & watching last wks hearing, that Judge Gorsuch will rule fairly.
Judge Gorsuch has been through the Senate confirmation process before when he was approved to the 10th circuit w/out opposition.
Judge Scalia left behind a legacy of faithfully applying the law & Judge Gorsuch is a worthy successor.

Since 2000, drug overdose deaths have increased by 137%.
